external_games.name: Five Nights at Treasure Island 2: Original Revamp

name: Five Nights at Treasure Island 2: Original Revamp
summary: You're Greg, you've been working on Treasure Island for a good few months, until, one day, your boss signs you up for another position, you're going to work in Treasure Island's main power building which supplies power for the Island's attractions and lights, you're a night guard in there for 5 nights due to recent reports of suspicious activity. Your job is to find out what's happening there. Nothing will go wrong right? On an island of Disney Dreams.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: FIVE NIGHTS AT TREASURE ISLAND 2: ORIGINAL REVAMP | NIGHTS 1 AND 2 | NOCHES 1 Y 2 | FNAF FAN GAME |
